item.title: Ten best places to Travel Solo in North India?
item.description: Here are ten of the best places to travel solo in North India, along with suggestions on when to visit and why they are ideal for solo travelers: Leh-Ladakh, Jammu and Kashmir When: May to September (summer months) Why: During this time, the weather is favorable, and most roads and passes are open, allowing solo travelers to explore the stunning landscapes, serene monasteries, and adventurous
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
